modName: Edorfin - Implemented Bosmer Follower of Setvi - Skyrim
summary:
This mod add a Bosmer follower who would be used in Windhelm's arena.
He was waiting for the Dovahkiin at the New Gnisis Cornerclub in Windhelm.
